# qlik Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "qlik" {
  tenant_id     = "your-tenant"
  region        = "eu"
  client_id     = "OAuth2 client id"
  client_secret = "OAuth2 client secret"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `region` (String)
- `tenant_id` (String)

### Optional

- `client_id` (String)
- `client_secret` (String, Sensitive)
